main module

main.create_tests(config_file: str = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>, output_filename: str = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>, clear_executions: bool = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>)[source]

Create tests descriptor from a given config.yaml containing the intended tests

Parameters

config_filestr (optional)

A string representing the name of the config file containing the names of the intended tests.

output_filenamestr (optional)

A string representing the name of the output file for the test descriptor.

clear_executionsbool (optional)

A boolean flag indicating whether to clear previous test execution history from the test descriptor before creating the new descriptor.

Returns

None

main.main(verbose: bool = False)[source]

5GASP CLI

main.read_testing_descriptors()[source]

Read testing descriptors from testing_descriptor_nods.yaml

Returns

testing_descriptor_nodsdict

Dictionary containing the testing descriptors.

main.read_tests_info()[source]

Read tests information from test_information.yaml

Returns

test_informationdict

Dictionary containing tests information from test_information.yaml.

main.reset_sections(intended_tests: {}, clear_executions: bool)[source]

Reset user-given sections to later be filled by the user

Parameters

intended_testsdict

Dictionary containing tests information from test_information.yaml.

clear_executionsbool

Boolean for whether to clear existing executions.

Returns

tests: dict

Updated testing descriptors.
